title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, May 22, 2013
description: Part of the promise of new technology is that it can help protect us when things go terribly wrong -- through prevention and appropriate reaction. San Francisco-based company Recovers is sending a group of employees to Moore, Oklahoma in the wake of Monday's tornado. They'll use tech skills and experience from other disasters to help.
